title: The Lotus Caretaker
description: When Nasrin Rezaei decided to sneak out of her foster home to watch a moonflower bloom, she never suspected she'd run into two different mummies fighting each other. Soon she is swept into a magical adventure trying to help Tiye, a mummy and the Lotus Caretaker of magical objects. As Nasrin learns about the magical world, her own power to control flowers, and hidden evil she also finds a way to regain the family both she and Tiye have lost in life.
author: Emily Kirby
